original_title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Chao Phraya River Cruise
overview: The Menam Chao Phraya is often referred to as The Royal River & is the largest river in Thailand. For several centuries everyday life of Bangkok has been associated with its canals. Due to the historic sites & fascinating sanctuaries that were built along the banks. This great royal river plays a vital role in the cultural development of Thailand
title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Chao Phraya River Cruise
